attributes.action: Ask ITV to  reverse its decision to axe the long standing TV Drama The Bill
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In recognition of 27 years of broadcast excellence providing training opportunities for a plethora of today's finest TV programme talent we the undersigned ask the prime minister to help save the jobs of the dozens of production staff and actors set to lose their jobs when ITV axes the popular drama The Bill This autumn

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
